neu:sampleInfo.neu:title: Fingers Sample C++
neu:sampleInfo.neu:description: The C++ Fingers sample demonstrates how to use enroll and/or identify faces in images retrieved from a file or a fingerprint scanner. This sample application has three modes:[br/] [b]Enrollment[/b] - Fingerprint can be enrolled from image or using fingerprint scanner.[br/] [b]Verification[/b] - Using this option one fingerprint can be verified against other (1:1 matching).[br/] [b]Identification[/b] - Using this option fingerprint is identified against internal database. (1:N matching).[br/] Sample uses wxWidgets framework.
